channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 美国最高金融监管机构已开始调查高盛（Goldman Sachs）在执行部分客户期货交易时是否不当收取费用。
item.description: A top US financial regulator has opened an investigation into whether Goldman Sachs improperly charged fees to execute some of its clients’ futures trades trib.al/yCTth31

item.title: 墨西哥折扣零售商 Tiendas 3B 的所有者收到的首次公开募股（IPO）订单超过了可用股票的数量，此前该公司扩大了上市规模，为公司和一批股东筹集了多达 5.89 亿美元的资金。
item.description: The owner of Mexican discount retailer Tiendas 3B has received more orders for its IPO than there are shares available, after the listing was enlarged to raise as much as $589 million for the company and a group of shareholders. trib.al/ULDqDUO

item.title: 对于等待买房的人来说，有一些令人鼓舞的迹象。但先不要抱太大希望
item.description: There are encouraging signs for people waiting to buy a home. But don’t get your hopes up just yet trib.al/FcEFzpa

item.title: 劳动力市场专家称，与人工智能的快速发展相关的裁员可能比我们知道的还要多
item.description: More job cuts are likely tied to rapid advances in AI than we know about, labor market experts say trib.al/TD6KVTW

item.title: 西好莱坞新建的一栋公寓楼租金高得吓人，但该物业的贷款方--KKR 房地产投资信托基金--却将其列入了观察名单，因为业主要应对自 2022 年以来飙升的借贷成本的重压
item.description: A newly built West Hollywood apartment building is commanding sky-high rents, but the property's lender — a KKR REIT — has it on a watchlist as the owner deals with the weight of borrowing costs that have surged since 2022 trib.al/44mtiMT

item.title: 根据美国经济谘商委员会（Conference Board）的数据，美国公司首席执行官的情绪指数两年来首次转为积极。
item.description: An index of sentiment among CEOs of US companies has turned positive for the first time in two years, according to the Conference Board. trib.al/eh5fXSF

item.title:
纽约巨人队 @kayvont 说，他希望能在波霸冰淇淋大行其道之前就投资它。
在本周的《教训与投资》节目中，他向我们讲述了他收到第一笔 700 万美元薪水的故事
item.description:
New York Giants @kayvont says he wishes he could've invested boba ice cream before it got big.

He tells us about receiving his first $7 million paycheck on this week’s Lessons and Investments trib.al/bFS1kRU

item.title: 英国工党斥资 280 亿英镑实施绿色政策的承诺终于落空。那么，他们提出了哪些替代方案呢？与@Hariboconomics 一起了解详情
item.description: The UK Labour Party's pledge to spend £28 billion on green policies is finally dead. So what are they proposing instead? Get The Readout with @Hariboconomics trib.al/t9d0AE3

item.title: 盈利强于预期，促使大西洋两岸的公司以迅雷不及掩耳之势宣布股票回购
item.description: Stronger-than-expected earnings are leading companies on both sides of the Atlantic to announce share buybacks at a blistering pace trib.al/C3dywYM

item.title: 在美联储可能在一段时间内保持政策稳定的信号下，美国抵押贷款利率走高
item.description: Mortgage rates in the US inched higher amid signals that the Federal Reserve is likely to keep its policy steady for some time trib.al/doy05pL

item.title: 随着阿比盖尔-约翰逊（Abigail Johnson）管理全球最大的基金管理公司之一的时间即将过去十年，富达对其高级管理层进行了调整，包括任命了一位新的财务总监。
item.description: Fidelity shook up its senior management ranks, including appointing a new finance chief, as Abigail Johnson approaches a decade of running one of the world’s largest money managers. trib.al/rD1Xhx5

item.title: 彭博新闻社看到的法律文件称，巴克莱银行前首席执行官 Jes Staley 在接管英国银行后的数年里与 Jeffrey Epstein 有间接接触
item.description: Legal documents seen by Bloomberg News claim former Barclays CEO Jes Staley had indirect contact with Jeffrey Epstein for years after taking over the UK bank bloom.bg/42z3v5t

item.title: 英国央行政策制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，她最近一次投票支持英国加息 "并不容易"，这表明她对货币政策的鹰派立场可能会在未来几个月有所缓和。
item.description: Bank of England policy maker Catherine Mann says her latest vote for a UK interest-rate hike was “not easy,” in a sign that her hawkish stance on monetary policy might soften in the coming months trib.al/07ObyFz

item.title:
-麦肯锡3,000人接受审查 -迪斯尼的伊格尔 -政府债券拍卖
@ManusCranny 报道。敬请收听美国东部时间凌晨 5 点的 "彭博简报
item.description:
-3,000 at McKinsey on review
-Vintage Iger at Disney
-Government bond auction

@ManusCranny reports. Tune into "Bloomberg Brief" at 5am ET trib.al/CR2Brdh

item.title:
-麦肯锡3,000人接受审查 -迪斯尼的伊格尔 -政府债券拍卖
@ManusCranny 报道。敬请收听美国东部时间凌晨 5 点的 "彭博简报
item.description:
-3,000 at McKinsey on review
-Vintage Iger at Disney
-Government bond auction

@ManusCranny reports. Tune into "Bloomberg Brief" at 5am ET trib.al/0qhnIMs

item.title: 哥伦比亚中央银行行长认为过快降息存在风险
item.description: Colombia Central Bank Chief Sees Risks in Cutting Rates Too Fast trib.al/bOjZd2e

item.title: 津巴布韦国家主权财富基金现已收购了国有矿业公司 Kuvimba 的全部股权，以结束对其所有权的猜测。
item.description: Zimbabwe’s state sovereign wealth fund has now acquired all of state mining company Kuvimba in a bid to end speculation about its ownership trib.al/Blti8UX

item.title: 一家正在开发全息技术的中国公司吸引了 "备忘录股票 "一族的注意。奖品：暴涨 2,650
item.description: A battered Chinese company that’s developing holographic technology captured the attention of the meme stock crowd. The prize: a 2,650% jump trib.al/mKDun35

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美国监管机构正在监控来自非银行抵押贷款机构的风险，并警告说，在市场紧张的情况下，其中一家非银行抵押贷款机构有可能倒闭。
item.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said US regulators are monitoring risks stemming from nonbank mortgage lenders, and cautioned that a failure of one of them is possible in the case of market strains trib.al/0g7TVS1

item.title: 加拿大在支持乌克兰问题上的政治共识开始出现裂痕，民意调查显示，保守党选民越来越反对动用资金和人力来帮助该国与俄罗斯作战。
item.description: Canada’s political consensus on supporting Ukraine is beginning to fray, with polls showing increased opposition among Conservative voters for using money and manpower to aid the country’s battle against Russia trib.al/rGydMNB

item.title: Apollo Global 的利润超出华尔街预期，因为利率上升推动了该公司信贷和保险业务的增长
item.description: Apollo Global's profit beats Wall Street expectations as higher interest rates boost the firm's growing credit and insurance businesses trib.al/gAGGNbA

item.title: 参议员乔-曼钦（Joe Manchin）计划在周四的参议院听证会上表示，白宫暂停新液化天然气出口审批的做法毫无道理，应 "立即撤销"。
item.description: The White House’s pause on new LNG export approvals is unjustified and should be “reversed immediately,” Senator Joe Manchin plans to say at a Senate hearing Thursday trib.al/XkOhM6m

item.title: 墨西哥水泥生产商提价并努力降低成本，但 Cemex 的销售额仍低于分析师预期
item.description: Cemex sales miss analysts’ estimates even as the Mexican cement-maker raises prices and works to reduce costs trib.al/JeumMxm

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: Five Things You Need to Know to Start Your Day: Americas trib.al/GYRUhP8

item.title: 乌干达中央银行表示，乌干达将依靠预算支持、石油工业和证券投资的恢复来为还款提供资金。
item.description: Uganda is banking on inflows for budget support, the oil industry and a recovery of portfolio investment to fund the repayments, according to the central bank trib.al/cvNvWoj

item.title: 通用大西洋公司同意收购资产管理公司 Partners Capital 500 亿美元的股份
item.description: General Atlantic agrees to buy a stake in Partners Capital, a $50 billion asset manager trib.al/Qw3YW17

item.title:
@markets RT：🇵🇰 巴基斯坦正在选举新领导人，其最受欢迎的政治家伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）身陷囹圄。
请在我们的实时博客中关注最新消息，您可以免费阅读 ➡️。
item.description:
🇵🇰 Pakistan is electing a new leader, with its most popular politician, Imran Khan, behind bars.

Follow the latest news in our live blog, which is free to read ➡️ trib.al/j45LluD

item.title: 从远处看，中国恒大具备进行不良债权交易的一切条件。但美国和欧洲对冲基金得到的却是一个残酷的教训：试图与共产党讨价还价是危险的
item.description: From afar, China Evergrande had all the makings of a killer distressed-debt trade. What US and European hedge funds got instead is a harsh lesson in the dangers of trying to bargain with the Communist Party trib.al/xeAWcmI

item.title: 今天是墨西哥和秘鲁的利率决定日--值得期待
item.description: It's rate decision day in Mexico and Peru — here's what to expect trib.al/b4iSc5T

item.title: 塞尔维亚将借贷成本稳定在近九年的高位，因为即使通胀率从去年的峰值继续放缓，但仍高于目标值
item.description: Serbia held borrowing costs steady at an almost nine-year high as inflation remains above target even as it continues to slow from a peak last year trib.al/1fCf9t9
